snippet: Rex Sinquefield, a retired financier, has used his fortune to build the Missouri city into the chess capital of the United States.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain chess column analyzes match played at the United States Junior championship in St Louis.
lead_paragraph: Rex Sinquefield, a retired financier, has used his fortune to build the Missouri city into the chess capital of the United States.

headline.print_headline: Refrain for Many Players: Meet Me in St. Louis
headline.main: Refrain for Many Chess Players: Meet Me in St. Louis
